com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile.pushmanager.api

Interface PushManager


  • public interface PushManager
    This class handles subscribing and unsubscribing Mobile SDK and its services to CPaaS Push Notification Channel.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkPushSubscription(PushSubscriptionCallback callback)
      Checks if the Mobile SDK has a valid Push Notification channel subscription to CPaaS.
      void injectPushMessage(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pushMessage, PushInjectionCallback callback)
      Injects the given push message into Mobile SDK, so that SDK will inform the related services.
      void refreshDeviceToken(java.lang.String deviceToken, PushSubscriptionCallback callback)
      Refreshes the device token of the Push Channel subscription.

      Subscribe pushNotification with username, deviceToken and accessToken.
      void unsubscribe(PushUnsubscriptionCallback callback)
      Unsubscribe from CPaaS Push Notification Channel.

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(java.lang.String packageName,
               java.lang.String deviceToken,
               PushSubscriptionCallback callback)
        throws MobileException
        Subscribe pushNotification with username, deviceToken and accessToken.

        First subscribe the Mobile SDK to CPaaS Push Channel. If it is successful, then subscribes all of the services to that Push Channel in an asynchronous manner. 

             
          cpaas.getPushManager().subscribe("package.name", "device_token", new PushSubscriptionCallback() {
              public void onSuccess(String callbackUrl) {

                  //   this means Mobile SDK is  subscribed to Push Channel on CPaaS, and also all
                  //  Mobile SDK services are subscribed successfully

                  Log.i("CPaaS.PushManager", "Subscribed to push channel successfully");
              }

              public void onFail(MobileError error) {
                  Log.i("CPaaS.PushManager", "Subscription to push channel failed");
              }
          });
        Parameters:
        packageName - package name of the app
        deviceToken - deviceToken of Firebase cloud messaging
        callback - to get result of the operation asynchronously
        Throws:
        MobileException
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe(PushUnsubscriptionCallback callback)
          throws MobileException
        Unsubscribe from CPaaS Push Notification Channel. 
             
          cpaas.getPushManager().unsubscribe(new PushUnsubscriptionCallback() {
              public void onSuccess() {
                  Log.i("CPaaS.PushManager", "Unsubscribed from push channel successfully");
              }

              public void onFail(MobileError error) {
                  Log.i("CPaaS.PushManager", "Unsubscription from push channel failed");
              }
          });
        Parameters:
        callback - to get result of the operation asynchronously
        Throws:
        MobileException
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • refreshDeviceToken

        void refreshDeviceToken(java.lang.String deviceToken,
                        PushSubscriptionCallback callback)
        Refreshes the device token of the Push Channel subscription.

        Device token may change on certain occasions (app update, app data clear up, etc.). When this happens, app developer should call this method to update the channel subscription. 

             
          cpaas.getPushManager().unsubscribe(new PushUnsubscriptionCallback() {
              public void onSuccess() {
                  Log.i("CPaaS.PushManager", "Unsubscribed from push channel successfully");
              }

              public void onFail(MobileError error) {
                  Log.i("CPaaS.PushManager", "Unsubscription from push channel failed");
              }
          });
        Parameters:
        deviceToken - deviceToken of Firebase cloud messaging
        callback - to get result of the operation asynchronously
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • checkPushSubscription

        void checkPushSubscription(PushSubscriptionCallback callback)
        Checks if the Mobile SDK has a valid Push Notification channel subscription to CPaaS.

        If Mobile SDK has a valid push subscription method will return success by calling onSuccess on given callback with callbackUrl of the subscription. If there is no subscription, callback will also return on onSuccess method but with a null value. 

             
          cpaas.getPushManager().checkPushSubscription(new PushSubscriptionCallback() {
              public void onSuccess(String callbackUrl) {
                  if (callbackUrl == null) {
                      Log.i("CPaaS.PushManager", "Mobile SDK isn't subscribed to Push Channel");
                  } else {
                      Log.i("CPaaS.PushManager", "Mobile SDK is subscribed to Push Channel");
                  }
              }

              public void onFail(MobileError error) {
                  Log.i("CPaaS.PushManager", "Push subscription check is failed");
              }
          });
        Parameters:
        callback - to get result of the operation asynchronously
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • injectPushMessage

        void injectPushMessage(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pushMessage,
                       PushInjectionCallback callback)
        Injects the given push message into Mobile SDK, so that SDK will inform the related services. 
             
          cPaaS.getPushManager().injectPushMessage("push_message");
     
 
             
          cPaaS.getPushManager().injectPushMessage(pushData, new PushInjectionCallback() {
              public void onSuccess() {

                  //   this means push message is injected to Mobile SDK successfully

                  Log.i("CPaaS.PushManager", "Push message is injected successfully");
              }

              public void onFail(MobileError error) {
                  Log.i("CPaaS.PushManager", "Push message injection failed");
              }
          });
        Parameters:
        pushMessage - Push message which is received from FCM
        callback - to get result of the operation asynchronously
        Since:
        1.0.0
